anyOf.description: The format of the binary data to read from
anyOf.title: File Format

anyOf.description: The format of the file to save the data as
anyOf.title: File Format

range.description: The range to read from the table. If set to a number it will be the starting row. If set to string it will be used as A1-style notation range.
range.title: Range

enableBOM.description: Whether to detect and exclude the byte-order-mark from the CSV Input if present
enableBOM.title: Exclude Byte Order Mark (BOM)

readAsString.description: In some cases and file formats, it is necessary to read as string to ensure special characters are interpreted correctly
readAsString.title: Read As String

sheetName.description: Name of the sheet to read from in the spreadsheet (if supported). If not set, the first one will be chosen.
sheetName.title: Sheet Name

delimiter.description: Set the field delimiter, usually a comma
delimiter.title: Delimiter

includeEmptyCells.description: Whether to include empty cells when reading from file. They will be filled with an empty string.
includeEmptyCells.title: Include Empty Cells

rawData.description: Whether to return RAW data, instead of parsing it
rawData.title: RAW Data

headerRow.description: Whether the first row of the file contains the header names
headerRow.title: Header Row

fromLine.description: Start handling records from the requested line number. Starts at 0.
fromLine.title: Starting Line

maxRowCount.description: Stop handling records after the requested number of rows are read. Use -1 if you want to load all rows.
maxRowCount.title: Max Number of Rows to Load
maxRowCount.displayName: Max Number of Rows to Load

compression.description: Whether compression will be applied or not
compression.title: Compression

headerRow.description: Whether the first row of the file contains the header names
headerRow.title: Header Row

fileName.description: File name to set in binary data. By default will "spreadsheet.<fileFormat>" be used.
fileName.title: File Name

sheetName.description: Name of the sheet to create in the spreadsheet
sheetName.title: Sheet Name

init_kwargs.title: Scade tools: Spreadsheet File
init_kwargs.description: Reads and writes data from a spreadsheet file like CSV, XLS, ODS, etc
